data.title: Dayton, OH - Welcome to Our Lady of Light Family of Parishes
data.meta_description: Welcome to Our Lady of Light Family of Parishes! Join our Catholic community found in the Bellbrook-Centerville suburbs of Dayton, Ohio and strive to make heaven present here on earth by walking alongside Christ in our everyday lives.
data.meta_site_name: Our Lady of Light Family of Parishes | Dayton, OH
